instruction: 1. Heat cooking oil in a pot. Fry cardamon seeds, cinnamon stick, cloves, star anise for 1 minute. Add diced onions, garlic, ginger, curry leaves and cook until fragrant and then add in the paste stirring constantly to prevent burning. Stir in the minced mutton, potatoes and coconut milk. Cook for 15 minutes or until potatoes are cooked. Add cilantro leaves and salt to taste.

preparation.3: 1/4 cup of coconut milk or yogurt
preparation.11: 250 grams ground mutton or ground lamb

title: Minced Mutton Curry
